title: Seeking Imagery inspiration
content:
Hi Guys,   
   
New member so this is my first post.   
   
I'm looking for a little inspiration for a current project.   
   
Basically I need some visuals for backgrounds on a kiosk. Categories are as follows - Email - Web Search - Chat - Games all the content is online delivered via ADSL.   
   
I have actually designed this service 2 times previously (both had a life of about 1.5 years) and am now doing a complete redevelopment. So finding it a little difficult to reinvent for a third time.   
   
I'm looking for more abstract imagery rather then the typical.   
   
Could be done in photography but moving more towards illustration or maybe even a mix.   
   
Any ideas???

 [‹ Typefaces for underground signage](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060140/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3473 "Go to previous forum topic") [Suitcase Vs Font Reserve - in Panther ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060140/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3535 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pixelpyro
